name: coderabbit-with-convex
title: CodeRabbit with Convex Storage
description: CodeRabbit core with Convex database adapter. Includes real-time sync, auth support, and schema definitions. Perfect for production applications requiring persistent storage and real-time updates.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. Pass ConvexReactClient instance and api to ConvexStorageAdapter constructor.
